General.Name: Bank Ina Perdana PT
General.Description: PT Bank Ina Perdana Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. The company operates through Marketing and Loans, Treasury, and Trade Finance segments. It offers current, savings, demand, time, and foreign currency deposits, as well as certificates of deposit and other bank deposits. The company also provides productive, consumer, and cashless credit products; and trade finance, and internet and mobile banking services. It operates through a network of branch offices and supporting branches, as well as automatic teller machines. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.
General.Address: Gedung Ariobimo Sentral, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12950
